high_descs: Turn around, walk past the dresser, and stand next to the bed.
Pick up the white pillow closest to the edge of the bed.
Walk around the bed to the nightstand on the other side of it.
Turn on the lamp on the nightstand.
anns.task_desc: Look at a pillow under the lamp on the nightstand.

high_descs: Turn around and walk toward the window, then turn left and walk up to the side of the bed
Pick up the nearest pillow from the bed
Turn left and walk all the way around to the opposite side of the bed where the side table is
Turn on the lamp on the side table
anns.task_desc: Examine the pillow under the light of the lamp

high_descs: Turn around and walk over to the headboard of the bed.
Pick up the pillow closest to you.
Turn left and and walk around the bed to the other side and over to the nightstand to the left of the bed.
While still holding the pillow, turn on the lamp that's sitting on the nightstand.
anns.task_desc: While carrying a pillow around the bed, turn on the lamp.
